item.title: New German leader Friedrich Merz will meet Trump at the White House next week
item.description: German Chancellor Friedrich Merz will travel to Washington next week to meet U.S. President Donald Trump and discuss the war in Ukraine and trade tens...

item.title: EU 'prepared to impose countermeasures' after Trump doubles steel tariffs to 50%
item.description: President Donald Trump announced Friday that he was raising tariffs on steel imports from 25% to 50%.

item.title: U.S. judge prevents Trump from invalidating 5,000 Venezuelans' legal documents

item.title: Pentagon chief says ready to 'fight and win' against China, urges Asian allies to boost defense spending
item.description: While playing up the U.S.'s enduring commitment to the Indo-Pacific region, Hegseth took swipes at the absence of China's defense minister Dong Jun.
